summary: Defines a set of generic Prefect block types for persisting common data values—ISO‑8601 timestamps, JSON‑compatible objects, confidential strings, and plain text—so they can be stored, versioned, and accessed consistently within Prefect workflows.
business_intent: Enable workflow developers to manage configuration, runtime metadata, and sensitive information through reusable, version‑controlled blocks, improving data handling, security, and reproducibility in automated pipelines.
